title: Dershowitz lashes out at Epstein accuser
text: Reports are in that the United States has helped broker a ceasefire, ending the Turkish military offensive in northeastern Syria that began last week. RT America's Sayeh Tavangar has the latest. Alan Dershowitz, former attorney to the now-deceased convicted sex offender Jeffrey Epstein, is being sued by Epstein's most vocal victim, Virginia Roberts Giuffre. Investigative journalist Ben Swann breaks it down. Classes are cancelled today in Chicago because 25,000 teachers are on strike. RT America’s Faran Fronczak reports.
description: Reports are in that the United States has helped broker a ceasefire, ending the Turkish military offensive in northeastern Syria that began last week
